\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.pool.maxused}
\label{configuration:DatabasePoolMaxused}
\ClearAPI
Maximum number of used connections in the database pool. If the limit is exceeded all further requests for connections are paused until either a connection is available or the timeout from \ref{configuration:DatabasePoolMaxwait} is reached. Valid values are all numbers > 0.

\type{de.osthus.ambeth.persistence.config.PersistenceConfigurationConstants.DatabasePoolMaxUsed}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.pool.maxused}}]
